channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Shohei Ohtani becomes the first MLB player to top 50 homers and 50 steals in a season
item.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers star reached the 50-50 milestone in his 150th game. He was already the sixth player in MLB history and the fastest ever to reach 40 home runs and 40 stolen bases in a season.
item.content:encoded:
The Los Angeles Dodgers star reached the 50-50 milestone in his 150th game. He was already the sixth player in MLB history and the fastest ever to reach 40 home runs and 40 stolen bases in a season.

(Image credit: Marta Lavandier)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Retiring Later in China; Getting a Driver's License in Mexico
item.description: In China the government is raising the official retirement age to combat a rapidly shrinking workforce. We hear reaction from Chinese workers. And life in Mexico City presents many challenges for people there. But getting a driving license isn't one of them.
item.content:encoded: In China the government is raising the official retirement age to combat a rapidly shrinking workforce. We hear reaction from Chinese workers. And life in Mexico City presents many challenges for people there. But getting a driving license isn't one of them.
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: A woman sustains leg burns after straying from Yellowstone trail
item.description: The 60-year-old woman, who has not been named, was near the Old Faithful Geyser at the Wyoming national park this week when she stepped through a thin crust over scalding water, park officials said.
item.content:encoded:
The 60-year-old woman, who has not been named, was near the Old Faithful Geyser at the Wyoming national park this week when she stepped through a thin crust over scalding water, park officials said.

(Image credit: Matthew Brown)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: NASA's 'Hidden Figures' awarded Congressional Gold Medals for pioneering space work
item.description: A group of Black female scientists and mathematicians known as NASA's “Hidden Figures” were honored Wednesday with Congressional Gold Medals, the highest award given to citizens by Congress.
item.content:encoded:
A group of Black female scientists and mathematicians known as NASA's “Hidden Figures” were honored Wednesday with Congressional Gold Medals, the highest award given to citizens by Congress.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: FAA investigating cabin pressure problem that injured passengers aboard Boeing plane
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is investigating an incident aboard a Delta flight in which a cabin pressurization issue with the Boeing 737 caused some passengers to bleed from the nose and ears.
item.content:encoded:
The Federal Aviation Administration is investigating an incident aboard a Delta flight in which a cabin pressurization issue with the Boeing 737 caused some passengers to bleed from the nose and ears.

(Image credit: Daniel Slim)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: 'Uncommitted' movement doesn't endorse Harris, but asks supporters to vote against Trump
item.description: The Uncommitted National Movement announces it will not endorse Vice President Harris but does not want supporters to vote for former President Donald Trump, and it discourages third-party votes.
item.content:encoded:
The Uncommitted National Movement announces it will not endorse Vice President Harris but does not want supporters to vote for former President Donald Trump, and it discourages third-party votes.

(Image credit: Matt Rourke)
item.dc:creator: Lexie Schapitl

item.title: 'Times' reporter Haberman weighs in on Trump, the media and the turbulent election
item.description: Maggie Haberman, who's spent years covering Trump, discusses his behavior on the campaign trail, including his insistence on responding to every slight — even when it undermines his appeal to voters.
item.content:encoded: Maggie Haberman, who's spent years covering Trump, discusses his behavior on the campaign trail, including his insistence on responding to every slight — even when it undermines his appeal to voters.
item.dc:creator: Dave Davies

item.title: An ex-CIA officer gets 30 years for drugging, filming and assaulting dozens of women
item.description: Brian Raymond admitting to drugging, filming and assaulting the women, most of whom didn't know until investigators showed them footage. Several shared their experiences in court as he looked on.
item.content:encoded:
Brian Raymond admitting to drugging, filming and assaulting the women, most of whom didn't know until investigators showed them footage. Several shared their experiences in court as he looked on.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: New research points to raccoon dogs in Wuhan market as pandemic trigger. It's controversial
item.description: With genetic samples from the infamous Wuhan market, a new study makes the case that raccoon dogs are likely the animal that infected humans. Proponents of the lab leak theory are dubious.
item.content:encoded:
With genetic samples from the infamous Wuhan market, a new study makes the case that raccoon dogs are likely the animal that infected humans. Proponents of the lab leak theory are dubious.

(Image credit: Noel Celis)
item.dc:creator: Gabriel Spitzer

item.title: Why Teamsters won't endorse a candidate for 2024. And, how to avoid credit card debt.
item.description: The Teamsters, a large and prominent union, is not endorsing a presidential candidate this cycle, breaking away from what other labor unions are doing. And, tips on how to avoid credit card debt.
item.content:encoded:
The Teamsters, a large and prominent union, is not endorsing a presidential candidate this cycle, breaking away from what other labor unions are doing. And, tips on how to avoid credit card debt.

(Image credit: Bilal Hussein)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton
